ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | shlesb1.1 | |- A e. SH |
| 2 |  | shlesb1.2 | |- B e. SH |
| 3 |  | #P_ssid | |- B C_ B |
| 4 | 3 | #P_biantrur | |- ( A C_ B <-> ( B C_ B /\ A C_ B ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 1, 2 | #P_shslubi | |- ( ( B C_ B /\ A C_ B ) <-> ( B +H A ) C_ B ) |
| 6 | 2, 1 | #P_shsub2i | |- B C_ ( A +H B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqss | |- ( ( A +H B ) = B <-> ( ( A +H B ) C_ B /\ B C_ ( A +H B ) ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_mpbiran2 | |- ( ( A +H B ) = B <-> ( A +H B ) C_ B ) |
| 9 | 1, 2 | #P_shscomi | |- ( A +H B ) = ( B +H A ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_sseq1i | |- ( ( A +H B ) C_ B <-> ( B +H A ) C_ B ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_bitr2i | |- ( ( B +H A ) C_ B <-> ( A +H B ) = B ) |
| 12 | 4, 5, 11 | #P_3bitri | |- ( A C_ B <-> ( A +H B ) = B ) |
